hero.name: Maria Victoria
hero.content: I am a Frontend developer specializing in Angular and TypeScript: I build scalable and accessible enterprise web interfaces, implementing state management with NgRx, integration with REST APIs, and reusable components. I have experience in UI migration, module architecture consolidation, and lazy loading to optimize performance. I apply Clean Code and SOLID principles, write unit and end-to-end tests (Karma/Jest/Cypress), and automate CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Jenkins for secure deployments. I work in remote environments using agile methodologies and collaborate closely with backend and product teams to transform requirements into reliable production software.

about.text: Passionate about software engineering and holding a degree in Mathematics from the University of Havana, I bring over 2 years of practical experience in enterprise frontend development. I worked at companies such as Zup Innovation and KBA Air Filters, where I migrated and optimized Angular architectures, implemented NgRx for complex flows, and standardized API contracts and test suites—in addition to automating CI/CD pipelines. As a freelancer, I delivered full-stack applications with Docker deployments and automated pipelines, and produced technical documentation and API guides. My skills include Angular, TypeScript, NgRx/Redux, REST integration, SQL/PostgreSQL, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Docker, testing (Karma/Jest/Cypress), and best practices (Clean Code, SOLID). I focus on quality, maintainability, performance, and aligning deliverables with business objectives.

experiences.description: I integrated frontends with authenticated REST APIs, designing contracts and test suites. I applied Clean Code and SOLID principles, conducted code reviews, and practiced pair programming to improve code quality.

I developed interfaces in Angular + TypeScript for logistics management portals, creating reusable components and implementing basic accessibility. I collaborated with backend teams to standardize API contracts and ensure observability using structured logs.

I delivered complete web applications using TypeScript and REST integrations, performing deployments with Docker and configuring automated pipelines. I implemented unit (Karma/Jest) and end-to-end testing to reduce regressions. I created technical documentation, API guides, and deployment procedures for clients, ensuring the maintenance and continuity of the solutions.

projects.title: Recipe App
projects.description: A modern web application for managing recipes, developed with React and TypeScript (Vite). It allows you to create, edit, view and search recipes, manage tags and ingredients, mark favorites and manage user profiles.

projects.title: Text Similarity Finder
projects.description: A project that allows searching for similar text strings within a set of files.

projects.title: Crypto-Backtesting
projects.description: Implements a complete quantitative analysis pipeline for the BTC/USDT pair..

projects.title: Six Degrees of Separation
projects.description: Implementation of a graph search algorithm to find the minimum number of degrees of separation between two actors, using IMDB data to construct the graph.
